name: Bhosty
description:
Ghosty, Bhosty, Shosty, Nhosty, Fhosty, Chosty, Ahosty, Lhosty, Zhosty and Khosty are a decade of characters from the NFT-Ghosts-Universum franchise. They first appear in the 2021 as the main nft ghosts.

The idea for the NFT-Ghosts was made from Ghosty desire to create NFT-Ghosts that could attract women and younger players, particularly couples, at a time where most Collectibles were "ape"-type nfts or other clones.

There are 1000 from Ghosty.
There are 500 from Bhosty.
There are 200 from Shosty.
There are 100 from Nhosty.
There are 50 from Fhosty.
There are 25 from Chosty.
There are 15 from Ahosty.
There are 10 from Lhosty.
There are 5 from Zhosty.
There is only one of Khosty and there will never be more!
